players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am shocked Diana was killed first. We must be careful and observe everyone’s behavior closely to figure out who the mafia is."
Bob: "I know who the mafia is: Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. However, I suggest we all work together to find out who else might be part of the mafia."
You: "I don't trust Charlie's sudden confession; it feels like a trick to gain our trust. Bob, can you share more about your investigation to help us decide?"
Bob: "I understand Alice's concern, but I have no reason to lie. I chose to reveal this now to save us time and protect the town. Charlie’s behavior and silence confirm my suspicion."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
